column1: Demo: Learning to Perceive Long-Range Obstacles Using Self-Supervision from Short-Range Sensors
Mirko Nava@Dalle Molle Institute for Artificial Intelligence
column2: Jérôme Guzzi@Dalle Molle Institute for Artificial Intelligence
column3: R. Omar Chavez-Garcia@Dalle Molle Institute for Artificial Intelligence
column4: Luca M. Gambardella@Dalle Molle Institute for Artificial Intelligence
column5: Alessandro Giusti@Dalle Molle Institute for Artificial Intelligence

column1: We demonstrate a self-supervised approach which learns to detect long-range obstacles from video: it automatically obtains training labels by associating the camera frames acquired at a given pose to short-range sensor readings acquired at a different pose.
